Catnet;

Request for comments (RFCs).

Just like the internet/web that we have now, Catnet standardizes protocols and interfaces via request for comments. They are for the purpose of standardization, and to get feedback from the community before they are integrates. Others can also submit their own RFCs for comment. The ones marked as non-finalized are open to comment.

Header Hierarchy System (HHS)
